attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app is complete and utter garbage wouldn’t even recommend it to my mother in-law ( I despise her). I wish I could give this app a lower rating than one star.

attributes.title: Please... no
attributes.review: A waste of an app and a waste of my time. I didn’t want to open the app and see Donald Trumps “pet shrimp” welcome me. This was a horrific experience and truly makes me regret being born.

attributes.title: Cheetos are ugly
attributes.review: I open the app and I see a cheetah with his hand up this was scaring me super Duper bad😳. Then it’s asking for my email so we can send me ugly pictures of Cheetos no one wants that

WHY ARE THERE PICTURES OF A CHEETO?! Stole my dog. Pet dinosaur was very angry. My aunt Jemima can’t make pancakes no more because of this! My pet turtle opened the app and started turning white! So did my black cat! As a local dinosaur I do not approve. My McDonald’s was not pleased

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: absolutely horrible. this app took 5 days to download, even when i have amazing wifi. once it downloaded, it asked for my address and 10 minutes later trump supporters are at my doorstep chanting for me to join their cult. if i could give this app a 0/10 i would.

attributes.title: THE WORST PERSON AND PRESIDENT
attributes.review: He is the worst president we ever had he is disgusting and disrespectful and he supports people that raps and hurts people and a lot more things and thats sad he doesn’t deserve an app or anything

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP. this app is always glitching. it never works and it keeps showing me a picture of a giant cheeto instead of trump. i am beyond disappointed with this app.

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: I wanted to support my president but as soon as I opened the app It crashed. This app needs to be taken down immediately!😔

attributes.title: Very upset
attributes.review: I can’t be on this app anymore my family members got covid 19 and our president don’t wear a mask becuse of Trump this so wrong on so many levels well god bless America

attributes.title: Very not okay.
attributes.review: So I got on the app and there was an orange man with like a very bad haircut and it was just very disturbing I am very unpleased with this already I thought this was a fun app but in reality it was just a scary app smh
